about_the_game:
High school teacher Yukio fell asleep at the end of the day, really like any other day... but this time it was different, the air was cold, the sky turned red, everything was dark and strange whispers were heard. steps... many things have changed.

Everything seemed like a nightmare until he realized that he had woken up, and while he was dreaming he heard a warning:

"I'm going to devour you human beings, if you can't escape, light the twelve lamps of the monster dimension and escape"

Then the young professor understood that if he couldn't escape, he would be devoured.

Puzzles, scares and strange creatures await you at the institute!
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/icono2048__13_.png


Terror in the environment: Yakyosho generates scares and moments of tension with the help of the environment and sounds. In the institute you can expect different mechanics, terrifying creatures and guaranteed scares.

Puzzles: Different mechanics to help you escape and force you to explore the whole environment, light and simple, but recurring, they can be complex so there is a guide in the menu, complete them to give you a little help while trying to complete the main mission.

No Auto Save – You will not be able to save your game, though some items will give you a second chance.

Story: Different chapters, each focused on a teacher's nightmare, one after another.

Kanashi Studio is an independent video game development company based in the Canary Islands specializing in the horror genre.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains bloody and violent scenes. (dismemberments)
